overview: Isla Fisher plays Kirsty, a sexy bad girl, who seduces Danny, a failed entertainer, in order to get him to accept a job training a crew of criminals who are posing as a children's entertainment group. The crooks plan on using their act as a distraction at a billionaire's child's birthday party in order to pull off a heist. This untalented bunch of crooks take the stage and become an unlikely overnight worldwide sensation.
title: Criminal Ways
